channel.title: Relationships - Part Three: Beneath the Skin - Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Lawrence Kelemen
channel.description: From talk shows to self-help books - everyone wants to know how to make relationships last. This lively class reveals the Jewish secret - so listen carefully.
